Name: Not on Shelf
Description: It was not found on shelf as expected.

Name: Missing
Description: Item has been misplaced within the workflow.

Name: Unplayable
Description: Item is so badly damaged that it cannot be sent to Memnon or IU

Name: Cannot go to Memnon
Description: Item cannot be shipped to Memnon. Can possibly go to IU though.

Name: Send to IU
Description: Item should be digitized by the IU facility.

Name: Catalog Problem
Description: Indicates that there is a problem with the catalog record for this item.

Name: Duplicate Record
Description: Indicates that this record is a duplicate of another record for the same item.

Name: Problem
Description: A problem with the item that cannot be described by any other condition status.
